title: ISic002932. funerary inscription for Rouphina
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΡΟΥΦΙΝΑΧΑΡΟΥΣΑΕΝ
2ΧΩΕΤΗΞΕ´ΑΝΕΠΑΥ
3ΣΑΤΟΠΡΟΙΔ´ΚΑΛΑΝΔΩΝΙΑΝΟΥΑΡΙΩΝ
4ΕΠ(scil. ΤΗ)ΙΑ´(scil. ΩΡΑ)

Apparatus criticus

Text of Ferrua 1946-47 ; Ferrua 1982-83: no.44 alternatively: ἐπ(ὶ τῇ) ια (ὑπατίᾳ); Feissel 1987: ἐπι(νεμήσεως) αʹ or ἐπι(νεμήσεως) ιαʹ

English translation

Rouphina, rejoicing in Christ, died at 65 years of age, 14 days before the Kalends of January (19 December), at the 11th hour [or: in the 11th consulship (of Honorius); or in the 1st/11th indiction]

commentary

The reverse of the stone was re-used for a later Latin inscription (ISic001669).

bibliography

  • 36.0872 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 1987.0553 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001282

  • Ferrua 1982-1983 15 no.44 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001996
  • Manganaro 1993 587 n.130 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001827
